rules_text:
Trample
At the beginning of your end step, if there are five or more creature types among non-Human creatures you control, you get {V} [i](a research counter)[/i].
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you have ten or more {V}, target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creature types among non-Human creatures you control.
notes: New art, +artifact type (to fit art), Giant —> Golem, three or more creature types among other creatures you control —> five or more creature types among non-Human creatures you control, new payoff ability
